ygData.subject: RE: spells?
ygData.msgSnippet: Heart Flutter also drops a monsters AC by 47 and his str by 17, hit it with the 1st lvl spell Siphon Str and that gives 10 more Str to you.   So with the 3 It
ygData.messageBody:
Heart Flutter also drops a monsters AC by 47 and his str by 17, hit it with
the 1st lvl spell Siphon Str and that gives 10 more Str to you. So with
the 3 It is Slowed, Weakened, Has its Ac dropped a good bit you are doing
about 400 points of damage in a min (The Dark Side has a nice listing of the
spells and what they do per tick).


<-- Enigma -->
Tech Supervisor of The Door ISP

-----Original Message-----
From: Dmitry M. Devishev [mailto:dmitry@...]

To: EQCheats@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQCheats] spells?

From: "Dmitry M. Devishev" <dmitry@...>

Hi!

> On a specific spells does anyone know about heart flutter? I looked a web
> site and it said 20 mana and 100 dmg it might have been dot but it also
had
> str and a/c reduced. this sound very effecient to meeee....

Afair it is 80 mana, but can be stacked with "engulfing darkness"
(~100dmg dot, +slow) and "heat blood" (~140dmg dot).

--
